name: Apartment Complex

arrival.text:
You stand in front of an ordinary _*Apartment Complex*_.

It seems, that the Journalist lived here.

Rain taps the cracked window. The neighbor across the hall watches you. (Try searching the desk and coat.)

onEnter.text: The apartment is cramped and stale. Dust glitters in the lamplight.
You slow your breath and trace the scene—dust motes, scuff marks, anything out of place.

flavor: Rain taps the cracked window. Someone left in a hurry.
weatherPool: Fog presses close to the brick.
Damp air clings to the hallway.
activityPool: Bo rubs the sleep from his eyes.
Bo flicks ash into an old tray.
enterHint:
This is the victim's apartment.

Type */enter apartment* to investigate the interior.
